announcements.title: Penpoint 1.3.0 Available
announcements.message: New features: Timeline view, character relationships, enhanced search, and 50+ bug fixes. This update improves performance and adds highly-requested features.

announcements.title: Spring Sale - 20% Off!
announcements.message: Support Penpoint development and save 20% until March 31st. Use code SPRING2025 at checkout. Perfect time to upgrade or gift to a fellow writer!

announcements.title: Pro Tip: Keyboard Shortcuts
announcements.message: Press Ctrl+K (Cmd+K on Mac) to quickly search characters, locations, and items across all your books. You can also use arrow keys to navigate results!

announcements.title: Join Our Community Showcase
announcements.message: Share your worldbuilding journey! We're featuring Penpoint users in our March showcase. Submit your character maps, timelines, or creative process for a chance to be featured on our blog.
